name: ThEGGame
description:
Game made in 1 week for the Spain game devs jam.

The goal of the game is to keep your Eggs safe from the invading monsters. In order to play it you must build towers in the workbench, pick them up and place them close to the enemies path. It's also possible to move the towers to other positions. Collect the gems to get enough crystals to build towers.

The time in the game will stop if you don't move, so in a sense, the game reacts to your actions (act-react theme)

I made this game with Axel Bahm.
